title: The True Nature of the Ghost Doctor: The Ugly Girl Will Go Against the Sky - Novel Updates
author: 北枝寒
description: She is an ancient martial arts genius in the twenty-first century who is excellent in both medicine and poison. She is the only bloodline of the first direct line of the first military general family in the Dong Ling Empire, with a pair of black eyes, so that she was broken as a waste at birth. Once she crossed over, she became her. Black hair and black eyes are ...... useless? She sneered, 'I'd like to see who is a waste of talent!' The medical system in hand, sitting on the heavenly beasts, cultivating the true scriptures, harnessing the beasts, ordinary flesh body walking around the six worlds at will, blind everyone's dog eyes! The scum sister wanted to seize power? Discover the adulterer so that you can make a thousand people humiliated! The rival prince dared to bully you? Lead ten thousand beasts to trample down the prince's house! Call her arrogant? Call her domineering? Well! I am arrogant, I am domineering, what can you do to me? However, this man who shocked the world as soon as he appeared was not sick, right, as soon as he saw her, he wanted to pluck out her eyes? 'Pluck out my eyes?' She laughed lightly ......>
